alert.note: Alert for Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yates and northwestern Steuben Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wayland, or 7 miles east of Dansville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bath, Wayland, Howard, Pulteney, Wheeler, Avoca, Cohocton, South Dansville, Haskinville and Kanona. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 35 and 38. Interstate 390 between 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
